This Django template dumps all the Google Tasks fields as a CSV file
column2: with dates formatted to be suitable for Excel.

column15: hidden{% for tasklist in tasklists %}{% for task in tasklist.tasks %}
{% if task.hidden %}"{{ task.hidden }}"{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}{% endautoescape %}
